response.overview: Our Babes Going Crazy series has been our best-selling soft erotic series three years running. Introducing Erotic Adventures, which re-defines the reality-based soft erotic genre! Journey to a clothing optional pool party at a luxury resort where some of the world's most beautiful women have gathered to be selected for an erotic yachting voyage. The winners are extraordinary. Their adventure begins by bus then becomes a sensual sun drenched glistening-body voyage up river to a tropical lagoon. It doesn't end there. These ladies, who've become very well acquainted, return to the resort for a night time pool party which could be the wildest you've ever seen! Erotic Adventures - Boat Party! Like nothing else!
response.title: Erotic Adventures: Boat Party!
